attributes.action: Totally overhaul immigration and asylum policy. Preserve our borders now!
attributes.additional_details: The current system is unsustainable, expensive, a risk to our security and a threat to our culture and way of life. We are taking in people with no background checks, some of who go on to commit crime, many of whom do not understand our language or culture. This building burden also puts an unfair financial penalty on government and the people and cannot be sustained! This needs to be enacted with immediate affect before it leads to real civil unrest and cultural collapse!
attributes.background: Complete reworking of policy on asylum seekers and immigration. To include changing or leaving ECHR, housing of illegal immigrants in remote off shore facilities. Permanent suspension of all benefits for illegal immigrants and suspension of any and all legal aid to them. Immediate repatriation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which calls for similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731719 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733844
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729027
